mapper.insert: insert into USE_INSTRUMENTS (ID, METHOD_NAME, LEAVE, LEAVETWO, BATH, BATHTWO, DRY, DRYTWO, SHAKE, EARTHQUAKE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leavetwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bathtwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{earthquake,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update USE_INSTRUMENTS set METHOD_NAME = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE = #{leave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVETWO = #{leavetwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATH = #{bath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATHTWO = #{bathtwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRY = #{dry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRYTWO = #{drytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHAKE = #{shake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EARTHQUAKE = #{earthquake,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, METHOD_NAME, LEAVE, LEAVETWO, BATH, BATHTWO, DRY, DRYTWO, SHAKE, EARTHQUAKE,ORG_CODE from USE_INSTRUMENTS
